name: Space Defender (itch)
description:
"Uuuh. shiny" - Control your spaceship and fire at the blocks, creating an explosion of light! Hopefully.

Hello friend. I have a website with other games. See them here: https://corpas.nu

This game is a 'grindy' space shooting game, in the style of the arcade game astroids. It's made in game maker 8.1, before it was mainstream :P. I would love to get your feadback on it

If you think the game is worth anything and you'd like to support me, that is much appreciated :)

Whatever you do, I hope you enjoy the game!

Any questions or issues can be submitted to me by email: gustav@corpas.nu
